name: Attuned_Ruin_D
display_help: Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}% and endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%.
power_short_helps: Enhances Accuracy, Reduces Endurance Cost and Increases Attack Rate
